窺探.definition: to pry into or spy on; to snoop; to peep; to poke one's nose into; to peer; to get a glimpse of

窺知.definition: to find out about; to discover

窺視.definition: to peep at; to spy on; to peek

窺豹.definition: lit. to see one spot on a leopard; fig. a restricted view

窺豹一斑.definition: lit. see one spot on a leopard (idiom); fig. a restricted view
